Identify Mood
Be positive about your future and get on with living a normal life.
Don\'t pray for an easier life, make sure you get stronger.
The worst loneliness is not feeling comfortable with yourself.
Nothing can dim the light that shines from within.
When we can no longer change the situation, we begin the challenge of changing ourselves.
There will be no victory of the light over the darkness until we stand for the simple truth, that instead of fighting the darkness, we must increase the light.
Resolve to make someone smile every day, but never forget that you are someone too.
There is no shame in fear, my father told me, what matters is how we deal with it.
Everything you\'ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
There are only two forces that unite human beings - fear and interest.
Life begins where fear ends.
Don\'t let the noise of other people\'s opinions prevent your inner voice from being heard.
Don\'t give in to your fears. If you give in, you won\'t be able to speak to your heart.
Fear has destroyed more dreams than failure will ever.
Surround yourself with people and areas of interest that do you good - and the rest will come by itself.
Life looks a lot more beautiful when you laugh.
The joy in your life relies on the quality of your thoughts.
Every day is a new opportunity to be happy.
Joy is the ability to enjoy the little things in life.
Out of joy, the work is done more successfully and more quickly.
A day without laughter is a day wasted.
When we try to hide our anger, we internalize it.
Anger is like a spirited horse, which if we let go of the bridle, its great enthusiasm soon comes to an end.
Anger in love is like salt; Do not overdo it.
Anger begins with madness, and ends with an expression of regret.
When we are angry, let us refrain from words and actions.
Getting angry means punishing yourself for the stupidity of others.
For every minute of anger you lose sixty seconds of peace.
Think good and it will be good. Think good and it will be good.
Stress does not raise the troubles of the future, but it does raise the strengths we have in the present.
Sometimes when you don\'t get what you want, you get what you need.
You can overcome anything, if you just love something enough.
Life is not waiting for the storm to pass, but learning to dance in the rain.
Be the change you want to see in the world.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Life is a series of surprises.
Deal with reality as it is and not as you would like it to be.
You cannot choose the events in your life but you can choose your attitude towards them
You can\'t change the cards you\'ve been dealt but you can play smart with them.
No amount of sorrow can change the past and no amount of worry can change the future.
Let change strengthen you and not weaken you.
Get out of your comfort zone - outside are all the interesting things.
